theDuelist:PlaceholderRelic.NAME: Placeholder Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain +1 [R] .

theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzle.NAME: Millennium Puzzle
theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzle.FLAVOR: It was originally known as the Millennium Pendant, but after being shattered and requiring assembly it came to be known as the Millennium Puzzle.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, trigger an effect depending on your chosen starting deck.

theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzleShared.NAME: Millennium Puzzle
theDuelist:MillenniumPuzzleShared.FLAVOR: It was originally known as the Millennium Pendant, but after being shattered and requiring assembly it came to be known as the Millennium Puzzle.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, trigger an effect depending on your chosen starting deck.

theDuelist:MillenniumEye.NAME: Millennium Eye
theDuelist:MillenniumEye.FLAVOR: It was created 3,000 years prior with other Millennium Items by Aknadin. After its creation, Aknadin himself put on the Eye, sacrificing his left eye in the process.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #yToon #yWorld.

theDuelist:MillenniumRing.NAME: Millennium Ring
theDuelist:MillenniumRing.FLAVOR: 3,000 years before present day events, the Millennium Ring and the other Millennium Items were forged in Kul Elna by sacrificing 99 souls of the Kul Elna villagers.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yIncrement #b3.

theDuelist:MillenniumKey.NAME: Millennium Key
theDuelist:MillenniumKey.FLAVOR: After it was made, the Millennium Key was given to Solomon Muto's Egyptian incarnate, Shimon, but later it was passed on to Shada.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 [E] at the start of each turn. Your max #ySummons cannot be higher than #b5.

theDuelist:MillenniumRod.NAME: Millennium Rod
theDuelist:MillenniumRod.FLAVOR: Priest Seto had originally owned the Millennium Rod. Along with the other Items, it was used to resurrect Zorc Necrophades.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add the start of each turn, add a #yrandomized #ySpell to your hand.

theDuelist:MillenniumCoin.NAME: Millennium Coin
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you #yEvoke, have a chance to gain #b
Gold. NL Each time you defeat an Elite or Boss, add #b10 Gold to this effect, and have a #b30% chance to increase the evoke chance modifier increase by #b10%.

theDuelist:StoneExxod.NAME: Stone of Exxod
theDuelist:StoneExxod.FLAVOR: A fragment of the Forbidden One?
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you shuffle your deck, add a random #yExodia card to your hand.

theDuelist:GiftAnubis.NAME: Gift of Anubis
DESCRIPTIONS: NL Summon #b1 and consume #b1 #yCharge. NL Starts with #b2 #yCharges. NL Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b3 #yCharges.

theDuelist:ResummonBranch.NAME: Millennium Branch
theDuelist:ResummonBranch.FLAVOR: The branch of a tree from the Ancient Egyptian era.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, #yResummon a random monster you have summoned this run for every card you #yExhausted on the previous turn.

theDuelist:AeroRelic.NAME: Orb of Slifer
theDuelist:AeroRelic.FLAVOR: A strange orb with mysterious power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAir orbs always #yChannel a random orb.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicA.NAME: Reward Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, receive #b5 extra card rewards and consume #b1 #yCharge. Starts with #b2 #yCharges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b1 #yCharge.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicB.NAME: Reward Token+
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, receive #b2 extra card rewards and consume #b1 #yCharge. Starts with #b10 #yCharges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b2 #yCharges.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicC.NAME: Reward Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, receive #b1 extra card reward and consume #b1 #yCharge. Starts with #b6 #yCharges. Upon defeating Bosses and Elites, gain #b1 #yCharge.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicD.NAME: Reward Orb+
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, have a #b25% chance to receive #b10 extra card rewards.

theDuelist:CardRewardRelicE.NAME: Reward Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you win combat, have a #b33% chance to receive #b3 extra card rewards.

theDuelist:InversionRelic.NAME: Inversion Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yInvert, #yEvoke the original Orb twice.

theDuelist:InversionEvokeRelic.NAME: Inversion Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yInvert, repeat the same #yInvert action.

theDuelist:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain +1 Strength.
